feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [craftcms/cms] Craft CMS Stored Cross-site Scripting Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
Summary

When you insert a payload inside a label name or instruction of an entry type, an XSS happens in the quick post widget on the admin dashboard.

PoC

Complete instructions, including specific configuration details, to reproduce the vulnerability.

Impact

Tested with the free version of Craft CMS 4.3.6.1

References

  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/security/advisories/GHSA-qcrj-6ffc-v7hq
  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#437---2023-02-03
  • https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53917092/215604129-d5b75608-5a24-4eb3-906f-55b192310298.mp4
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-23927
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qcrj-6ffc-v7hq

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SQL Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, an SQL injection risk was identified in the library fetching a user's recent courses.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36393
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424798
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f46j-r7q3-6cm2

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Session Fixation vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, a remote code execution risk was identified in the Shibboleth authentication plugin.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36394
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424799
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2563-fp9c-mgm8

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption
entry.content:
In Moodle, the file repository's URL parsing required additional recursion handling to mitigate the risk of recursion denial of service.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36395
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-273w-7fxj-pcp6

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery
entry.content:
In Moodle, insufficient redirect handling made it possible to blindly bypass cURL blocked hosts/allowed ports restrictions, resulting in a blind SSRF risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36396
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424802
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4rmj-w58m-fvch

entry.title: [uvdesk/community-skeleton] uvdesk/community-skeleton vulnerable to Stored Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository uvdesk/community-skeleton prior to 1.1.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1197
  • https://github.com/uvdesk/community-skeleton/commit/6fae9442361c8a216611d3622bec26249a8c48a0
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/97d226ea-2cd8-4f4d-9360-aa46c37fdd26
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hfxp-j95j-cwrp

entry.title: [wallabag/wallabag] Wallabag Improper Authorization vulnerability
entry.content:
Improper Authorization in GitHub repository wallabag/wallabag prior to 2.5.4.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-0734
  • https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/commit/acd285dcbb71b595e6320bb1d0d3a44cdf646ac0
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/a296324c-6925-4f5f-a729-39b0d73d5b8b
  • https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/releases/tag/2.5.4
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8ccw-f83g-v7g3

entry.title: [phpseclib/phpseclib] phpseclib Infinite Loop vulnerability
entry.content:
Math/PrimeField.php in phpseclib has an infinite loop with composite primefields. This vulnerability was introduced in version 3.0.0, and has been patched in 3.0.19. The CVE for this issue originally identified the the vulnerable version as 2.x, however, the vulnerable functionality was not introduced until version 3.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-27560
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440#commitcomment-103226722
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/releases/tag/3.0.19
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hm7p-r324-hhf3
